sentence: The group filed a similar challenge on behalf of voters against Rep. Madison Cawthorn, R-N.C, which a federal judge in that state blocked last month.
title: Challenge to Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene's re-election bid can proceed, judge rules

sentence: In contrast, the group's legal action against Greene has taken a different course from its lawsuit against North Carolina Rep. Madison Cawthorn, who also faces a Republican primary in mid-May.
author: Steven Rosenfeld
title: Marjorie Taylor Greene Facing Questions Under Oath Over January 6 Role, by Steven Rosenfeld

sentence: The group filed a similar challenge on behalf of voters in western North Carolina against Republican U.S. Rep. Madison Cawthorn, who spoke at the rally that preceded the riot.
author: Associated Press
title: Marjorie Taylor Greene testifies in constituent suit seeking to disqualify her from re-election to Congress

sentence: The group filed similar challenges on behalf of voters in Arizona, where a judge on Friday ruled to keep the Republicans on the ballot, and in North Carolina against Republican U.S. Rep. Madison Cawthorn, who spoke at the rally that preceded the riot.
author: Kate Brumback
title: WATCH: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene fights court challenge to her reelection

sentence: Similar challenges have been filed against other Republican lawmakers, including Reps. Andy Biggs (R-Ariz.), Paul Gosar (R-Ariz.) and Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.), though a federal judge has blocked the challenge to Cawthorn's ability to appear on the ballot.
author: Max Greenwood
title: Greene rebuffs Jan. 6 criticism during tense hearing

sentence: North Carolina GOP Rep. Madison Cawthorn blasted the Left for dredging up photographs of him wearing women's lingerie, saying the newly resurfaced photos amount to a desperate attempt to hurt him.
author: Misty Severi
title: Cawthorn slams Left for unearthing 'goofy' photos of him in lingerie

sentence: AD WARS Sen. THOM TILLIS isn't letting up in his opposition to fellow North Carolina Republican Rep. MADISON CAWTHORN: A Tillis-aligned super PAC is putting up $310,000 to air an ad attacking Cawthorn, per Axios' Lachlan Markay.
title: POLITICO Playbook PM: McCarthy gets a lifeline (and another leak)

sentence: A similar challenge backed by the same group against Republican U.S. Representative Madison Cawthorn failed when a federal judge in North Carolina dismissed that suit on March 4.
author: Jan Wolfe
title: Firebrand U.S. Republican Marjorie Taylor Greene faces 'insurrectionist' challenge

sentence: So Madison Cawthorn, Marjorie Taylor Greene, Paul Gosar, Andy Biggs, and [Arizona State Rep.] Mark Finchem are all involved in more than just a vote inside the House chamber.

title: Insurrectionist' Marjorie Taylor Greene Goes Under Oath Today

sentence: A similar challenge backed by the same group against Republican U.S. Representative Madison Cawthorn failed when a federal judge in North Carolina dismissed that suit on March 4.

sentence: Greene filed a federal lawsuit to shut down the state process -- which is how GOP Rep. Madison Cawthorn fended off a similar candidacy challenge in North Carolina.

title: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene testifies for more than 3 hours in hearing on whether to disqualify her from seeking reelection
